nodes.text: Drahgor III, also referred to as Drahgor Three, was a terrestrial planet located in the galaxy that was the homeworld of the Gozzo species, feathered beings with long, thin legs. The planet was covered in yellow fog, and its dense atmosphere was host to lightning. The Gozzo Flix hailed from Drahgor III, and he returned to his homeworld around the year 34 ABY to acquire fuel for the Colossus, the supertanker fuel depot on which he resided. During his visit, he, along with fellow Colossus residents Kazuda Xiono and Torra Doza, discovered his cousin Flanx and the rest of his flock had disturbed the rumored Karnex dragons that dwelled deep within the planet.

Drahgor III, also known as Drahgor Three, was a rocky planet located in the galaxy that was covered in yellow fog and had an atmosphere that was dense, breathable, and filled with lightning. Its mercurial surface was barren save for the native Gozzos, a species of long-limbed, feathery sentients, and the massive Karnex dragons that lived deep underground. The world was covered in mountains with large cave networks beneath the surface.
Drahgor III was first mentioned in the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, New Edition.  It first appeared in the Star Wars Resistance Season Two episode "From Beneath."
